overview: PURGATORIC is an experimental art film from award-winning filmmaker Emma Dark. Shot digitally it has been affected in post production to give it a Super 8mm look and feel. The film explores themes of death, sadness, uncertainty, and ultimately hope. PURGATORIC stars cult film and arts icon Billy Chainsaw, with music by London (UK) based band The Core.
tagline: You have put me in the lowest pit, in the darkest depths. You have overwhelmed me with your waves.
title: Purgatoric
